configureForIntegration

  • configureForIntegration(_commerceCode: string, _apiKey: string): void
    • Defined in transbank/webpay/oneclick/index.ts:47

    This methods configures the module to point to the Integration Environment with the given params. You can check use the credentials provided in the official docs. https://transbankdevelopers.cl/documentacion/como_empezar#codigos-de-comercio

    Parameters

    • _commerceCode: string

      Commerce Code given by Transbank.

    • _apiKey: string

      Api Key given by Transbank.

    Returns void

  • configureForProduction(_commerceCode: string, _apiKey: string): void
    • Defined in transbank/webpay/oneclick/index.ts:36

    This methods configures the module to point to the Production Environment with the given params.

    Parameters

    • _commerceCode: string

      Commerce Code given by Transbank when contracting the product

    • _apiKey: string

      Api Key given by Transbank when you sucessfuly validate your integration

    Returns void
